text: nivu kanuviri â€“ suryanu udayisidaga adu (adara belaku) avara guheya balabhagadinda hadu hoguttittu mattu adu astamisuvaga avarannu tappisikondu avara edabhagadinda hadu hoguttittu. Avaru adara (guheya) ondu visala bhagadalliddaru. Ivella allahana sucanegalu. Allahanu yarige daritoridano avanu saridariyannu padedanu. Innu avanu yarannu darigedisidano avanu tanagagi yavude raksaka athava margadarsiyannu kanalaranu
